examples.example: 他对她一直保持着痴情，用真诚和关怀守护着她。

translate.english: He has always been infatuated with her and guards her with sincerity and care.

examples.example: 尽管遇到了很多困难，但他的痴情从未改变，始终坚信爱情的力量。

translate.english: Although encountering many difficulties, his infatuation has never changed, and always firmly believes in the power of love.

examples.example: 他是个痴情的人，对待爱情一心一意让人感动。

translate.english: He is a spoony person, and his single-minded treatment of love is touching.
